org.eclipse.californium.core

Class CoapResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResponse

  • public class CoapResponse
extends Object
    CoapResponse provides a simple API for CoAP responses. Use a CoapClient to send requests to a CoAP server and receive such a response.

    CoapResponse wraps an instance of type Response that is used internally in Californium. To access this object directly for more detailed information, call advanced().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected CoapResponse(Response response)
      Instantiates a new coap response.

      byte[] getPayload()
      Gets the payload of this response as byte array.
      String getResponseText()
      Gets the payload of this response as string.
      boolean isSuccess()
      Checks if the response code is a successful code.
